item.title: Pulumi overview
item.description: If by an odd quirk of fate you work with cloud infrastructure and hear Infrastructure as a Code mantra, then you should be familiar with IaC tools like: Terraform / Terragrunt Pulumi AWS Cloudformation (sorry there will be no link to this piece of shit) AWS CDK My jorney started with Terraform, but over time I switched to Pulumi. So let’s get a little bit of details what Pulumi is
